default.title: WELCOME TO THE AR EXPERIENCE
default.description: Use your device to reveal what's hiding behind the portal. Once a model is detected, interactive information will appear here.

0.title: Future Vehicle
0.description: The Starship is a next-generation aircraft combining advanced technology with aerodynamic design. Activate Inspection Mode to explore its energy source and navigation system.

1.title: Energy Generator
1.description: This model represents a futuristic energy infrastructure powered by renewable sources. Use Inspection Mode to examine how energy is generated, stored, and distributed.

2.title: In Sun's Orbit
2.description: The Planetary System model showcases the structure and dynamics of a speculative solar system. Activate Inspection Mode to explore the orbital paths and unique characteristics of each celestial body.

3.title: The Future of Planet Earth
3.description: This model represents Earth in a possible future. Your choices influence its state. Select at least three values from different life categories. Based on your combination, the planet will appear as healthy, sick, or destroyed. Activate Inspection Mode to examine each version in detail.

4.title: Planet: Destroyed
4.description: This version of Earth shows a collapsed, post-apocalyptic world. Explore the environmental degradation, craters, and remnants of civilization in Inspection Mode.

5.title: Planet: Sick
5.description: A damaged Earth, struggling with pollution and imbalance. Activate Inspection Mode to observe signs of ecological stress and resource depletion.

12.title: Planet: Normal
12.description: A balanced, yet vulnerable planet. This is the neutral default state. Use Inspection Mode to observe its current stability.

6.title: Phase 1 Mask
6.description: This mask represents the utopian version of the future. Tap the 'Phase 2' button to switch to the dystopian counterpart.

7.title: Phase 2 Mask
7.description: This mask visualizes a dystopian interpretation of the future. Tap the 'Phase 1' button to return to the utopian variant.

8.title: Cyberpunk City
8.description: A dark, neon-lit metropolis driven by high technology, corporate dominance, and social decay. Use the toggle to switch to the Solarpunk City model.

9.title: Solarpunk City
9.description: A bright, green city of the future based on sustainability, community, and clean energy. Use the toggle to switch to the Cyberpunk City model.

10.title: Magazine Cover
10.description: A reinterpretation of the magazine cover through today’s lens—blending current aesthetics with imagined futuristic elements. It reflects our present-day vision of the future and acts as a symbolic entry point to the AR experience.

11.title: Creators of the Future
11.description: This 3D scan gallery showcases the creators behind this magazine and WebAR experience. All individuals are part of the course 'Design & AI' at the Faculty of Media Production (FB2), Technische Hochschule OWL. Explore the team shaping visions of futurism in Inspection Mode.

8.title: Cyberpunk City
8.description: A chaotic, neon-drenched future of technology and inequality. Use the toggle to explore its Solarpunk counterpart.

9.title: Solarpunk City
9.description: A green utopia powered by renewables and harmony with nature. Use the toggle to return to the Cyberpunk vision.
